author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Needs a `[compat]` section in `Project.toml` with at least an entry for `julia` itself, e.g.:
```toml
[compat]
julia = "1"
```
would mean that the package is compatible with Julia versions `[1.0.0, 2.0.0)`.
Good point; I'm going to fix that and bump to v0.1.0 because v0.0.1 doesn't feel accurate. I'm going to do that once https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/2719 is merged.
